column1: Master of Business and Information Systems Engineering (Leuven)

The Master of Science in Business and Information Systems Engineering programme prepares you in both business management as well as information systems within an international context. In our modern society no organisation can function without information systems.Find out more about the course content, starting profile, future prospects,... on the programme's websiteVisit the programme website
Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
